message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $110? It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $95, Bob. But I'm willing to compromise again. How about we meet at $105? It's still a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Can you consider that?
